snippet.title: HyperParasite - Welcome to Asiatown
snippet.description:
HyperParasite is a homage and a love letter to those 80's cheesy action movies. 

The second level is called 'Asiatown' and it's full of karateka, martial art guys, kickboxers, sumo fighters, you name it!

We needed a proper way for all these bad guys to make an entrance, so we decided to have them fly through windows and pop out of hot tubs in the bath house, just like in 80's action movies.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/83...

Discord server: https://discord.gg/xpwaMzT

Snatch, Zap and Repeat your way through a dystopian 1980's as a mysterious organism bent on world domination.

HyperParasite, a relentless twin-stick shooter/brawler with rogue-lite mechanics coming soon to a host near you!

Follow the development on http://www.hyperparasite.com
